body.name: Amazon Essentials 14k Gold Plated or Silver Plated Modern Oval Hoop Earrings
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 28 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 38 mins
features: STYLE: Add a touch of elegance to your outfit with these modern oval hoop earrings measuring 15mm (0.6") in diameter and 2.5mm width; perfect on its own or with your favorite Amazon Essentials jewelry.
DETAILS: Hypoallergenic, nickel and lead free.
CARE: Plated with anti-tarnish coating; store in a cool, dry place in its own container or compartment; limit exposure to extreme temperatures, perfume, and household cleaning products.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #5,152 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #1,137 in Women's Hoop Earrings

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these! They are comfortable, cute, go with everything, and still look new after showering in them a lot and wearing them constantly (I got silver).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and Durable
reviews.reviewText: I engaged my wife in this review process, so I could get an idea of how they performed. Here is what we agreed on:I examined the color consistency and overall physical build, first. I like the way these are constructed. Though they are very lightweight, they are strong and well built. The coating has an even luster, which I think separates them from "cheap" earrings. They look good on my wife's ears and she liked the way they looked when she viewed them in the mirror. Now, here is what was unexpected: These were so lightweight that once my wife put them on, she left them on (she does not leave earrings on, most of the time). She forgot about them, and wore them to bed (she has never done that before), and had them on the next morning. When I asked her about wearing them all night and into the next day, she said they were very comfortable and they were so hypoallergenic, that they did not irritate her ears, even after wearing them for about 16 hours or more. She has had a lot of issues with almost all earrings making her ears sore after much fewer hours. So, these errings were a win-win.I cannot think of anything that I do not like and when I asked my wife, she could not think of anything either. However, in my observation, as a man, I did not think these were very fancy, and my wife agreed. She said she considered these to be more like every day, wearing to work or shopping, type earrings, not so much for formal dress-up.Overall, these seem to be attractive, a very good value, and made to last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Small Earrings
reviews.reviewText: I bought these with MY OWN MONEY for Mother’s Day. They are small and hinged at the bottom and snap into place at the top which makes them fairly secure. You can adjust the post if they don’t close properly. These are not super heavy, but they do have some weight to them so I think they are solid. They are very shiny with a good silver color. They come in a “velvet” bag. Stamped with IBB CN which is a company name and indicates they’re made in China. Hope they’re real silver. They’re nice little hoops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wear small huggie earrings on a daily basis (2 sets for 2 holes) and I love them because I never take them out and they don’t stab my neck when I sleep. They truly embody the philosophy "I don't get ready, I stay ready."These earrings elevate my normal huggie earring lifestyle. I can sleep in these and not feel them at all just like my huggies, yet they look substantial enough that you might think I spent time deciding on earrings that morning. I’ve also used them in my second hole with a larger hoop style earring in my first and liked that look as well. Overall, a very versatile earring.It should also be noted these earrings do not irritate my sensitive skin and the clasps hold tight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic Loops, Very small and Light
reviews.reviewText: These are rather smaller than I expected them to be. There are light weight and perfect for everyday wearing. They have a classic look. These earrings would go with any outfit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These earrings are a great addition to my wardrobe. They have maintained a nice shine or the months of use, and they don't cause a reaction on my skin (I have sensitive ears. I firmly don't believe the claim that it's made with 14k plated silver, especially at the price listed, but so far they feel good and look great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice modern take on a classic, surprisingly nice quality
reviews.reviewText: This was my first time trying Amazon Essentials jewelry, and I was pleasantly surprised! These earrings are surprisingly nice quality and look a lot more expensive than $15. The thick oval shape is a nice modern twist to a classic standard, and these earrings go with everything. I got the silver, but they also come in yellow gold so there’s a match for everyone. Sometimes this kind of earrings can be difficult to open, but I haven’t had any issues with these. They seem well made, but I’ll update later if I have any issues with tarnishing or discoloration. My only con is that they come in a small ziplock bag instead of a box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are very right for the price!
reviews.reviewText: For the reasonable price you are getting some nice added bling here. These are nice to wear by themselves, or with other multiple earrings. No, these are not high end earrings made out of precious materials. I am not so sure they even have 14K gold, but I think, so what?. That is not what you are paying for here! They are just a fun addition to your collection. They actually did ship with a nice cloth pouch and good packaging to keep them from scratching. A lot of care went into this from the seller for a relatively inexpensive item! If you are sensitive to metals I may be a little concerned, but I am having no problem with them... Enjoy!
